Plot: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.
Title: American Wedding
Actors: Jason Biggs, Seann William Scott, Alyson Hannigan, Eddie Kaye Thomas
tomatoConsensus: Raunchier and even more gross than the first two American Pies, American Wedding ought to please fans of the series.
